products.name: Advanced Surgical Operation Table
products.description: Experience the pinnacle of surgical precision and patient comfort with our advanced operation table. Equipped with intelligent positioning system and radiolucent design.

products.name: Versatile Multi-functional Operation Table
products.description: Maximize versatility and streamline surgical procedures with our multi-functional operation table. Easily adaptable for various specialties with interchangeable attachments.

products.name: Ergonomic Electric Operation Table
products.description: Effortlessly adjust the height and position of the table for optimal surgeon comfort and precise control. Enhance efficiency with intuitive control panel and durable construction.

products.name: Pediatric Operation Table
products.description: Designed specifically for pediatric surgeries, this operation table ensures the highest level of safety, comfort, and flexibility for young patients and medical staff.

products.name: Mobile Operation Table
products.description: Experience enhanced mobility and stability with this mobile operation table. Designed for easy maneuverability and patient transfer within the operating room or medical departments.
